page.title: 10Where I Live
page.content: I live in 34,Serle House.It is a very old building.Downstairs there is a porch.There are two pubs beside the building.In the porch there are concrete posts.Around the building there lots of flats.I live in a part of London called Tower Hamlets. In Tower Hamlets there are lots of different kinds of housing.There are tower blocks,maisonettes,terraced, semi-detached and detached houses. There are also lots of pubs and shops. Some are new and some are old.My building is in the Ocean Estate,which was built just over 30 years ago.The condition of the buildings in my area is poor and mucky,they need lots of work to be done on them. Paul Coster(9)
